channel.title: Microsoft for Developers
channel.description: Get the latest information, insights, and news from Microsoft.

item.title: 【February 2026 Insiders (version 1.110)】2026 年 2 月 Insider（版本 1.110）

item.title: 【Light up Multiple Databases with a Single API with Data API builder's multi-source configuration】通过数据 API 构建器的多源配置，通过单个 API 点亮多个数据库
item.description: 【Data API builder (DAB) supports multi-source configurations Data API builder (DAB) connects to your database with a safe REST or GraphQL endpoint. But DAB is not limited to just one database. Using a multi-source configuration, you can connect to more than one database simultaneously. Learn more about Data A】数据 API 构建器 (DAB) 支持多源配置 数据 API 构建器 (DAB) 使用安全的 REST 或 GraphQL 端点连接到您的数据库。但 DAB 并不仅限于一种数据库。使用多源配置，您可以同时连接到多个数据库。了解有关数据 A 的更多信息

item.title: 【The 2026/2027 Seattle Symphony subscription season at a glance】2026/2027 西雅图交响乐团订阅季一览
【Customizing the ways the dialog manager dismisses itself: Detecting the ESC key, first (failed) attempt】自定义对话框管理器自行关闭的方式：检测 ESC 键，第一次（失败）尝试
item.description: 【Suppose you want to distinguish between dismissing a dialog by pressing ESC and dismissing a dialog by clicking the Close button. One suggestion I saw was to call Get­Async­Key­State(VK_ESCAPE) to check whether the ESC is down. In general, any time you see Get­Async­Key­St】假设您想要区分通过按 ESC 关闭对话框和通过单击“关闭”按钮关闭对话框。我看到的一个建议是调用 GetAsyncKeyState(VK_ESCAPE) 来检查 ESC 是否已关闭。一般来说，任何时候您看到 GetAsyncKeySt

item.title: 【Using Codes to Increase Adherence to Prompts】使用代码来提高对提示的遵守程度
item.description: 【Introduction: The Problem Agentic systems have some discretion in the parameters they send to tooling, but there are cases, such as experimentation, when you need 100% adherence to a set of parameters. In practice, this tension exists because modern LLM-based agents are optimized for semantic correctness and helpfulness, not for s】简介：问题代理系统在发送给工具的参数方面有一定的自由裁量权，但在某些情况下，例如实验，您需要 100% 遵守一组参数。在实践中，这种张力的存在是因为现代基于 LLM 的代理针对语义正确性和有用性进行了优化，而不是针对s

item.title: 【Migrate your Semantic Kernel and AutoGen projects to Microsoft Agent Framework Release Candidate】将您的语义内核和 AutoGen 项目迁移到 Microsoft Agent Framework 候选版本

item.title: 【Microsoft Agent Framework Reaches Release Candidate】Microsoft Agent 框架发布候选版本
item.description: 【We're happy to announce that Microsoft Agent Framework is now in Release Candidate status for both .NET and Python. Release Candidate is an important milestone on the road to General Availability — it means the A】我们很高兴地宣布，Microsoft Agent Framework 现在处于 .NET 和 Python 的候选版本状态。候选版本是通用化道路上的一个重要里程碑——它意味着 A

item.title: 【Custom Agents in Visual Studio: Built in and Build-Your-Own agents】Visual Studio 中的自定义代理：内置和构建您自己的代理
item.description: 【Agents in Visual Studio now go beyond a single general-purpose assistant. We're shipping a set of curated preset agents that tap into deep IDE capabilities; debugging, profiling, testing alongside a framework for building your own custom agents tailored to how your team works. Built in agents Each preset agent is designed around a s】Visual Studio 中的代理现在不再是单一的通用助手。我们正在提供一组精心设计的预设代理，可利用深度 IDE 功能；调试、分析、测试以及框架，用于构建适合您团队工作方式的自定义代理。内置代理 每个预设代理都是围绕一个 s 设计的

item.title: 【C++ symbol context and CMake build configuration awareness for GitHub Copilot in VS Code】VS Code 中 GitHub Copilot 的 C++ 符号上下文和 CMake 构建配置感知
item.description: 【C++ code navigation and build system tooling play an important role in the developer inner-loop. Code navigation tooling provides a precise, semantic understanding of your codebase, while build system tooling helps you express build configurations and variants for reproducible builds. In the VS Code ecosystem, these powerful capabilities are a】C++ 代码导航和构建系统工具在开发人员内循环中发挥着重要作用。代码导航工具提供对代码库的精确语义理解，而构建系统工具可帮助您表达可重现构建的构建配置和变体。在 VS Code 生态系统中，这些强大的功能是

item.title: 【Exploring the signals the dialog manager uses for dismissing a dialog】探索对话框管理器用于关闭对话框的信号
item.description: 【There are a few different built-in ways to close a dialog box in the classic Windows dialog manager. Let's run them down. First, there's hitting the ESC key. The ESC key, as with all keyboard navigation, is handled by the Is­Dialog­Message function. Assuming that the dialog control with f】在经典的 Windows 对话框管理器中，有几种不同的内置方法可以关闭对话框。让我们把他们打倒吧。首先，按下 ESC 键。与所有键盘导航一样，ESC 键由 IsDialogMessage 函数处理。假设对话框控件带有f
